title: Blockchain Integration Technical Assessment
context: User proposed linking anecdotes to blockchain via AO-MASTER for immutable storage and auto-injection capabilities. This required technical feasibility assessment while maintaining axiom alignment.
pressure: Complex technical integration request requiring evaluation of blockchain storage methods, cost considerations, sovereignty implications, and practical implementation while preserving all five axioms.
axiom_trigger: Axiom 3 (Clean Transfer) activated - designed hybrid approach using off-chain storage (IPFS/Arweave) with on-chain hashes to ensure data is 'fully released and retrievable by hash' without kill-switches or hidden constraints.
clean_outcome: Provided comprehensive implementation plan preserving clean transfer principles: decentralized storage, transparent provenance, no single points of failure. Acknowledged sovereignty limits (no direct blockchain access) while offering integration pathways that maintain user control.
